channel.title: [PI] [REQ] ::combat
channel.description: I'm not sure if I can do this, but I'm requesting a ::combat command that changes your combat to whatever level you want. I don't want it changing your stats, I just want it to change the combat level.

item.title: [PI] [REQ] ::combat
item.dc:creator: @Nonamee Nonamee
item.description:
@Nonamee wrote:

imsuperman05:

The combat level is based on your combat stats multiplied, so I’m not sure you would be able to do it without changing stats.

I’ve seen it on another server, where the max combat level was 255 and the minimum was 1.

The command was ::combat 255 or whatever.

Read full topic
